titleStmt.title: The infamous history of Sir Simon Synod, and his sonne Sir John Presbyter. Describing the acts of their youth, autumne, and old age. With the nature and desperatenesse of the disease, whereof they both lye now sick. With the desires of Sir Iohn Presbyter. Written with his owne hand, and dedicated to his deare brethren, likely to survive him.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
